column1: in memory of maeli mc. call garrison -- fausett mortuary| first: last: maeli mc. call garrison june 18
column3: 2015 maeli was born silent to chance matthew and mc. kenzie ann spears garrison on the 18th of june
column6: utah. she is the sister of korbin and macee. her grandparents are jarilyn magnuson spears and frank spears
column7: and wendy and dave maxwell and ron and terri garrison. she is also survived by aunts
column9: who will all miss her. a graveside service will be held on thursday
column11: 2015 at 11:00 at the castle dale city cemetery. services are entrusted to fausett mortuary.
